UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: An amphipathic peptide combats multidrug-resistant Staphylococcus aureus and biofilms.
Literature.Author: Zhang K, Yang N, Mao R, Zhao Y, Teng D, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=64µg/ml)
